thread.title: BRIEF-Lake Shore Bancorp Says Lake Shore MHC Got Notice Of Non-Objection To Waive Right To Get Dividend

title: BRIEF-Lake Shore Bancorp Says Lake Shore MHC Got Notice Of Non-Objection To Waive Right To Get Dividend

locations.name: brief-lake shore bancorp says lake shore

organizations.name: brief-lake shore bancorp says lake shore mhc

text: March 9, 2018 / 7:09 PM / in 25 minutes BRIEF-Lake Shore Bancorp Says Lake Shore MHC Got Notice Of Non-Objection To Waive Right To Get Dividend Reuters Staff March 9 (Reuters) - Lake Shore Bancorp Inc: * SAYS LAKE SHORE MHC GOT NOTICE OF NON-OBJECTION OF FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF PHILADELPHIA * SAYS NOTICE OF NON-OBJECTION FOR WAIVER OF RIGHT TO GET DIVIDENDS PAID BY CO DURING YEAR ENDING FEB 7, 2019, UP TO $0.10/SHARE ON QTRLY BASIS‍ ​ * SAYS EXPECTED THAT MHC TO WAIVE DIVIDENDS DECLARED DURING 12-MONTHS ENDING FEB 7, 2019 * SAYS LAKE SHORE MHC‍​ ELECTED TO WAIVE RIGHT TO GET DIVIDEND TO BE PAID ON MARCH 15 - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2p14ucn ) Further company coverage:
